FIELD.NAME: result
FIELD.COMMENT: Contains array of results, e.g. [8.5, 6.75]

FIELD.NAME: testnr
FIELD.COMMENT: The test number for the submitted result. Made up of the student offset and class test number.

FIELD.NAME: testid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the given test.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user taking the test.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the test. Can be active or disabled.

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of the test.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: The short name of the test.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the test with HTML formatting.

FIELD.NAME: video
FIELD.COMMENT: Link to the video.

FIELD.NAME: thumbnail
FIELD.COMMENT: Thumbail for the test

FIELD.NAME: resulttype1
FIELD.COMMENT: The first result type. Can be used standalone or in conjunction with the second result type, which will be used to output an average.

FIELD.NAME: resulttype2
FIELD.COMMENT: The second result type. Will often be NULL as it is optional.

FIELD.NAME: gender
FIELD.COMMENT: Gender for catered tests, 1 = Men/Unisex, 2 = Women

FIELD.NAME: minmax
FIELD.COMMENT: This field determines the grading style of the test.

FIELD.NAME: method
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading method for the test.

FIELD.NAME: maxresult
FIELD.COMMENT: This field is for the calculation of the grade, which is linear.

FIELD.NAME: minresult
FIELD.COMMENT: The minimum result of the test.

FIELD.NAME: offset
FIELD.COMMENT: The offset for correcting the test number if a student is moved to a different class.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User-ID to identify the user's preference

FIELD.NAME: classid
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's class id.

KEY.NAME: classid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the class id.

TABLE.NAME: local_fitcheck_classes
TABLE.COMMENT: Classes of students to organize the results for the teacher.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the class. Editable by teachers

FIELD.NAME: gender
FIELD.COMMENT: Gender for the class.

FIELD.NAME: testnr
FIELD.COMMENT: Current test number for the fitcheck class

FIELD.NAME: teacherid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the teacher of the class
